name: Track Trash Racing
description:
Issues with the web build or too much lag? Try a build from below 

Unfortunately there is currently a bug causing the camera to jerk around quite a bit. Working on a fix, but for now, heads up!

You are a sphere, something terrible has happened to the town of Moon. There is trash everywhere! Some say it came from the sky, but no matter where it came from, the Spheres of Moon need your help! 

WASD - Movement 

Shift - Sprint 

Space - Jump

 -- Credits --
